title: That's No Way To Treat Your Bishop || Carlsen vs Nakamura || MC Invitational (2020)
description:
Support fishnet here https://lichess.org/get-fishnet

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Hikaru Nakamura
Magnus Carlsen Invitational GAME 1, 18.4.2020
Queen's Gambit Declined, classical variation (5.Bf4) (D37)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 d5 4. Nc3 Be7 5. Bf4 O-O 6. e3 Nbd7 7. c5 c6 8. h3 b6 9. b4 a5 10. a3 h6 11. Bd3 Bb7 12. O-O Qc8 13. Re1 Ba6 14. Bc2 Re8 15. Rc1 axb4 16. axb4 bxc5 17. bxc5 Bd8 18. Ra1 Bc7 19. Qd2 e5 20. dxe5 Nxe5 21. Nxe5 Bxe5 22. Bxe5 Rxe5 23. Qd4 Re8 24. e4 dxe4 25. Nxe4 Nxe4 26. Rxe4 Rd8 27. Qc3 Rd5 28. Rea4 Bb7 29. Rxa8 Bxa8 30. Qa5 Bb7 31. Qb6 g6 32. Be4 Rd7 33. Bf3 h5 34. Re1 Qd8 35. Qxd8+ Rxd8 36. Re7 Ba6 37. Bxc6 Rc8 38. Re8+ Rxe8 39. Bxe8 Kf8 40. Bc6 h4 41. f4 Ke7 42. Kf2 f6 43. Ke3 Ke6 44. Be4 g5 45. Kd4 gxf4 46. Bd5+ Ke7 47. Ke4 Bc8 48. Kxf4 Bd7 49. g3 hxg3 50. Kxg3 Kf8 51. h4 Kg7 52. Kf4 Kh6 53. Bf3 Kg7 54. Ke4 Bc6+ 55. Ke3 Bb5 56. Kd4 Kf7 57. Kd5 Ke7 58. Bg4 Bd3 59. c6 f5 60. Bf3 Bb5 61. c7 Kd7 62. Ke5 f4 63. h5 Bc4 64. h6 Bg8 65. Bd5 Bh7 66. Be4 Bg8 67. Kxf4

World Champion Magnus Carlsen takes on world blitz no. 1 Hikaru Nakamura today in a 4-game rapid match as the $250,000 Magnus Carlsen Invitational begins. Usually that pairing would eclipse any other match, but 16-year-old Alireza Firouzja taking on world no. 3 Ding Liren is almost as mouth-watering. Can Alireza continue in the form that saw him beat Magnus in the Banter Blitz Cup final? All the games will be streamed live on chess24 with commentary in 9 languages as a new age of online chess begins.

https://chess24.com/en/read/news/the-magnus-carlsen-invitational-starts-today
